Html:
I make some web system with jHtmlArea.

The page with jquery-1.8.3.min.js works well.
But with jquery-1.9.1, jquery-1.10.2, cannot work well.

What should I do?
If I should change something to jquery-1.9.1 or jquery-1.10.2,
please tell me.

I had the solution by myself.

That is the addition of jquery migrate like follows.
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-1.10.2.min.js"></script>
<script type="text/javascript" src="http://code.jquery.com/jquery-migrate-1.2.1.min.js"></script>
ref) jquery migrate

jHtmlArea breaks with jQuery 1.9+ because $.browser has been removed. Use of $.browser is frowned upon. jQuery recommends using the Modernizr library to detect specific features instead, but this does not seem straightforward to apply in this case. Using jquery-migrate, as noznoz7 suggested, will work, but this does not seem like the best solution...

Hello,
Version 0.8 will solve these problems. It is found under the "Source code" - https://jhtmlarea.codeplex.com/SourceControl/latest
Thanks Steffan! I found the verson 0.8 code under the jHtmlArea Website directory. I think your solution to include a $.browser in the script is reasonable.

Thanks Steffan.
I've confirmed new version without jquery-migrate.
